chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:
The phone is unfortunately in poor external condition and does not meet the category standards. It is damaged and dirty around the camera on the back side, and there are scratches on the housing side as well.
Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We will reimburse the customer 40.00 euros because he received the device with scratches.

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market
